save_images[source]

save_images(product, save_dir)

Saves product's images to disk.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

get_mapping(product, columns:List[str])

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

bson_to_jpeg[source]

bson_to_jpeg(path:"Path to BSON")

Coverts BSON to JPGs and saves product id to category mapping as CSV.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
!rm data/train_example.csv
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
path = Path("./data/train_example.bson")
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
%time bson_to_jpeg(path)
